title: Check browser compatibility
description: Help us understand if your browser can support the "File System API" needed for enhancements to download responses in bulk (more than 150 at once).
step1: Select a folder on your computer.
step2: Allow "This site to view, modify, and copy files".
step3: Save changes to the folder to check if the functionality is supported.
successMessage: This browser on this device can download responses.
cannotDownload: Cannot download responses using this browser on this device.
testCancelled: Test was cancelled. Please try again to check if responses can be downloaded using your browser on this device.
fileSystemRead: File System Read Ask For URLs
fileSystemWrite: Enable File System Write Ask for this URL
additionalResources: Learn more about the File System API
mdnWebDocsDescription: Comprehensive documentation on the File System API
webDevGuideDescription: Google's guide to simplifying access to local files

supportForm.title: Submit results from the browser check
supportForm.description: Send us your browser information by submitting your email and we'll investigate further. We may follow up to learn more.
supportForm.successTitle: Thank you, your results have been sent.
supportForm.successMessage: We've received your information and will try to get back to you soon.
